message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $80. Would it be possible for us to negotiate down to that price?
I understand you're looking to keep costs low, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $120.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the effort, I still believe we can find a price closer to my budget. Would it be possible for us to settle at $95?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $140, but that's as low as I can go.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $100, which I believe is fair for both of us.
I've already made a significant concession, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $145. That's my final offer.
I appreciate your offers, Alice, but I am unable to meet you at $145. I would like to propose a final price of $130, which I hope you can consider.

I've already made a lot of concessions, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $155, which is the lowest price I can accept. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
